entry.title: Today in DeFi - LayerZero on Polygon zkEVM, Optimism Superchain Token List, Stake to Earn on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: LayerZero on Polygon zkEVM Interoperability protocol LayerZero is now live on Polygon zkEVM, enabling devs to build on Polygon zkEVM and expand to 30+ supported chains with ease. Support Today in DeFi Today in DeFi is now a grantee on Gitcoin Grants’ latest round.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Swell Network Beta, Cashmere on Testnet, Stake to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Swell Network Beta Liquid staking protocol Swell Network launches beta on Ethereum, offering zero-fees staking with an opportunity to participate in Swell’s governance. Cashmere on Testnet Cashmere, an MEV-protected cross-chain swap, is now live on testnet

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - RocketPool Atlas Live, Bancor Carbon AMM, Helium on Solana, and More...
Today in DeFi - Bancor Carbon Live, Iron Fish Mainnet, Free MEV Protection, and more...
entry.summary: Bancor Carbon Live Bancor launches the Carbon AMM. Carbon offers irreversible Range Orders and automated Recurring Strategies and is MEV-resistant. Iron Fish Mainnet Iron Fish, a privacy-focused L1, launches mainnet. For now, users are able to host a node, start mining, mint/burn custom assets, or transfer assets on Iron Fish.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Helium on Solana, Celer Supports Polygon zkEVM, Farming on zkSync Era, and more...
entry.summary: Helium on Solana Helium has completed the migration and is now live on Solana, with almost 1m hotspots have joined the network as NFTs. Celer Supports Polygon zkEVM Celer cBeidge now supports bridging between polygon zkEVM and other chains including Ethereum, BnB chain, Polygon, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maverick Live on zkSync Era, Li.Fi Bridge Insurance, LSD Degen Farm, and more...
entry.summary: Maverick on zkSync Era Maverick, a dynamic distribution AMM that focuses on capital efficiency, is now live on zkSync Era. Maverick previously launched on Ethereum. ETHTaipei 🇹🇼 ETHTaipei will be held from April 21 to 25. The event unites Ethereum-focused teams from across the globe to discuss trends and build on Ethereum.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - RocketPool Atlas Live, KyberSwap Elastic Vulnerability, Key Governance Votes and more...
Last Week in DeFi - Uniswap Wallet on iOS, Ethereum Shanghai Live, Hundred $7m Exploit, and more...
Today in DeFi - Uniswap Wallet Live on App Store, Ondo MMFs Stablecoin, Trade to Earn, and More...
entry.summary: Uniswap Wallet Live on App Store Uniswap Wallet iOS app passed the App Store review and is now available for download. The wallet supports networks including Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, and Optimism, and charges 2.55% in fees for crypto purchases. Ondo MMFs Stablecoin

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn $10m Exploit, Ethereum Shanghai Live, Farming on zkSync Era, and More...
entry.summary: Yearn $10m Exploit Yearn is exploited and lost ~$10m. The attacker conducted a flash loan attack through Aave and exploited the Yearn USDT token (yUSDT), then acquired a large number of stables on Curve pool. The team tweets that V1 and V2 vaults are unaffected, and is investigating the contract issue.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Redemption Live, Shanghai Mainnet Coming, Intro to ZK-Rollup L2, and More...
entry.summary: Euler Redemption Live Euler has revised the redemption plan for the exploit. Affected users can now check their redemption numbers at https://redemptions.euler.finance/ Shanghai Mainnet Coming The Ethereum Shanghai upgrade (Shapella) will be activated at block 6209536 (~4/12/2023, 10:27:35 PM UTC).

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Solend V2 Live, Avocado on Polygon zkEVM, LSD Degen Farm, and More...
entry.summary: Solend V2 Live Solend V2 phase 1 is now live with borrow weights, TWAP oracles, and outflow rate limits enabled on Solend contracts. Avocado Live on Polygon zkEVM Avocado Wallet now supports Polygon zkEVM. Built by Instadapp, Avocado is a smart contract wallet that allows unified cross-chain execution.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Sushi Hacked, Ribbon Aevo Live, Ethereum Shanghai Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - Sentiment Exploit & Recovery, MEV Blocker Live, Tokenomics upgrade, and More...
entry.summary: Sentiment Exploit & Recovery Sentiment got exploited and lost ~$1m in USD. The root cause of the exploit was a read-only reentrancy attack, which was used to manipulate the asset price. After a negotiation between the Sentiment team and the attacker, ~90% of lost funds had been returned.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Arbitrum AIP-1 Drama, Euler Funds Recovered, zkEVM Launches, and More...
Today in DeFi - StarkNet Alpha Mainnet, Phantom Supports EVM Apps, GLP Leverage, and More...
entry.summary: StarkNet Alpha Mainnet StarkNet alpha v0.11.0 is now live on mainnet, with Cairo 1.0 contract mainnet deployment to be enabled soon. Free Web3 Domain Based on your Twitter Handle Unstoppable Domains is a sponsor of Today in DeFi and a domain registrar that allows you to own domain names representing your unique identity or brand on web3.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yama Live on Arbitrum, Balancer Halving, Farming on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Yama Live on Arbitrum Yama is live on Arbitrum. Yama issues YAMA, an omnichain stablecoin, and allows users to swap between YAMA and USDT without slippage or fees. Users can lend their USDT to the PSM to earn yield. Borrowers can borrow Yama against deposited collateral.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Hacker Returning Funds, Native USDC on Cosmos, Lending on Gnosis Chain, and More...
entry.summary: Euler Hacker Returning Funds Euler lost ~$200 million in a flash-loan attack on March 13. The hacker has now returned ~84% (approx. $176m) of the stolen funds while the negotiation is ongoing.
